array.string: Developer website: www.tinyflare.com QQ group: 485788362
There are a lot of the easter eggs of classic dungeons in the game, to seriously explore.
To equiped off-hand weapon can unlock the corresponding skills of the character.
There are a lot of traps in the game scene, please pay attention to use the search function to find, use the interactive function to remove.
In the BOSS room, the trap can't be removed.
In addition to defeating monsters to gain experience, you can also gain experience by discovering hidden informations and removing traps.
By increasing the magic find rate can improve the magic items dropped channce.
Poisoning and weak states can not automatically recovered.
Destiny scroll will trigger a variety of effects, there are good and bad.
You can bet with the "little thief" for luck, maybe you can get very good props.
Missed information can be reviewed through the information bar.
Often use interactive features you may find some hidden information from the game.
You can come back to life by watching ads, which is the most effective way to support developers.
If you think the game is not bad, please don't forget to rate on App Store.
Note that when the map is opened, the game will not be paused.
The quality of the items are represented by white green blue and purple.
Subsequent versions are being developed, include new scenes and new props features
Please note that make the maximum damage and the minimum damage a balanced development in order to ensure maximum attack power.
Nearly a hundred kinds of achievements in the game waiting for you to challenge.
Don't look down upon the elite monsters(green name) in the game.
To keep carry the keys of chest, so as not to miss the chance to find good props.
Game map is randomly generated, and there are a lot of hidden room, please note that.
You can choose to use stealth potion or scroll of random teleport to help you out when encountering the siege.
You can go back to the upper floor when you find that the monster in the dungeon is too powerful.
Each new archive may start with a different dungeon.
Click on the character profile image and backpack can open the information bar.
The orange color progress bar on the bottom buttons represents the experience of your progress.
To challenge higher levels of monsters can gain higher experience.
Killed the monster that level lower than the player 5 or more will not gain experience.
If you have any place to make you laugh in the process of playing the game, please laugh heartily, this is our desire to design the game at first.
Maybe you don't understand the funny moments in the game, but you can use google.
If you like the game, please join the official QQ group 485788362, your idea is likely to be added to the game's subsequent version.
To improve light range properties of player allows you to see farther and more details.
To improve the scope property of search can allow you to explore a wider range.
To improve the block rate property can be more triggered by block, that can reduce damage by half.
To improve the rate of critical strike can be more triggered by crit, that can double the damage.
To improve the rate of dodge property can be more triggered by dodge, that can completely ignore the damage.
When the off-hand weapon is shield can increase the block rate and defense.
There is no classes in game, the skills dependent on the off-hand weapon.
Open the backpack and the information bar can be suspended for the game, Don't worry about being attacked by monsters.
In the main interface of the game, the potions shortcut button can be more effective for you to fight, please ensure that there is enough potions in the backpack.
The same type of potion and scroll items can be superimposed, there is no limit to the number.
No identification of props can not to be use, you need use the "scroll of identify" to identify.
100 copper coins can be exchanged for one silver coin, 100 silver coins can be exchanged for one gold coin.
No need items can be discard, discarded items will not be recovered.
When the backpack space is not enough, you can use the backpack expansion function, the backpack can expand up for 4 times.
A variety of items can be used to classify by the label under the backpack.
Items that cannot be sold will not appear at the time of sale.
The NPC "Little Knight" to sell a variety of weapons in the game.
The NPC "Alchemist" to sell all kinds of potions, scrolls and keys in the game.
The NPC "Shopgirl" sell all kinds of accessories and armor in the game.
The jars in the game can be broken, there may be gold, props or monsters.
The chests is divided into copper chest, silver chest and gold chest, the better quality the better props.
When you find that there is no way to go, please pay attention to the surrounding walls, and there may be a door that is hidden on the wall.
When you find a chest is not locked, you should pay attention to, it is very likely to be a trap.
BOSS Fight is quite challenging, please have the enough strength to challenge, and prepare enough potions.
When make a fighting with boss, the door will be locked, you can't escape.
There are a lot of props reward in the boss room, but you need to beat the boss and get the room key from it.
The portal in boss room will teleport you to the next dungeon.
There is often a locked room in the dungeon, and the key is often obtained in this level floor.
In Boss Fight floor can not be revived, then restart from the last upper floor.
The program will save the game when switch the scene or player death, do not worry about losing game progress.
This is not a real RougeLike game, the role of the property will be saved, but the map information will not.
When encountered the abyss, the player can choose to jump, the good luck if you can go directly to the next floor, bad luck, you will be killed.
When the props no need, it can be sold to NPC, which is a good way to make money.
